name: LarsLars
description:
Description
A singleplayer game where you shoot four sorts of enemies so that they fall out of the screen. It features 24 seconds of soundtrack. It furthermore features six color schemes. It was made in two weeks (but during one week no work was done) for a challenge.

Known problems
Physics may bug out killing the player. Messing with screen size in options bugs out the game if not restarting.

Tested hardware
It has been tested on a 64 bit windows system and a mac running osx yosemite.

Hopefully you'll enjoy playing it as much as I enjoyed making it :)
